tr.td: When using Java 1.4, it may be necessary to fork the JUnit tests to prevent XML parser issues. The default value is no.
The directory to invoke the VM in. (ignored if fork is disabled). The default value is ${basedir}.
If this value is set to false, JUnit test run details will appear on the console as the tests are executed. If not, they are stored in a file in the test-reports directory. The default value is true.
Specifies the unit test classes directory. This is the location where the java classes for the test source code will be generated to. The default value is ${maven.build.dir}/test-classes.

Specifies the integration unit test classes directory. This is the location where the java classes for the integration unit test source code will be generated to. The default value is ${maven.build.dir}/iutest-classes.

Specifies the integration unit test source directory. This property should never be overridden as the value is determined directly from the project descriptor. The default value is ${maven.integrationUnitTestSourceDirectory}.
Specifies the directory where the integration unit testing is run. The default value is ${build.dir}/iutest.
Specifies the directory of the web application used to perform integration unit testing. The default value is ${iutest.dir}/testapp.
Specifies the configuration directory used to build the web application used for integration unit testing. The default value is ${iutest.dir}/cactus.

Specifies your local Tomcat installation directory. The default value is ${tdk.home}. If ${tdk.home} is not specified in your ${user.home}/build.properties, you should set this property. This is used for the integration unit testing.
Specifies the port that Tomcat will use for integration unit testing. The default value is 8192.
